content.paragraph: Evaṃ me sutaṃ – ekaṃ samayaṃ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divāvihāragato pāpake akusale vitakke vitakketi gehanissite. Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi –
content.gathalast: Tato sukhī hohisi vītarāgo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Aratiṃ pajahāsi sato, bhavāsi sataṃ taṃ sārayāmase;
content.gathalast: Pātālarajo hi duttaro, mā taṃ kāmarajo avāhari.
Evaṃ bhikkhu padhānavā satimā, vidhunaṃ pātayati sitaṃ raja’’ntntti.
content.paragraph: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.

Ekaṃ samayaṃ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divāvihāragato supati. Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi –
content.gatha1: ‘‘Uṭṭhehi bhikkhu kiṃ sesi, ko attho supitenasupinena te;
content.gathalast: Āturassa hi kā niddā, sallaviddhassa ruppato.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yāya saddhāya pabbajitoyāya saddhāpabbajitoyāya saddhāpabbajitoyāya saddhāpabbajito , agārasmānagāriyaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tameva saddhaṃ brūhehi, mā niddāya vasaṃ gamī’’ti.
Baddhesukhandhesu muttaṃ asitaṃ, kasmā pabbajitaṃ tape.
Taṃ ñāṇaṃ pariyodātaṃpariyodātaṃparamodānaṃparamodātaṃparamodātaṃparamavodānaṃparamavodānaṃ , kasmā pabbajitaṃ tape.
Asokaṃ anupāyāsaṃ, kasmā pabbajitaṃ tape.
Nibbānaṃ abhikaṅkhantaṃ, kasmā pabbajitaṃ tape’’ti.
content.paragraph: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā kassapagotto kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kassapagotto divāvihāragato aññataraṃ chetaṃ ovadati. Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmantaṃ kassapagottaṃ saṃvejetukāmā yenāyasmā kassapagotto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ kassapagottaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi –
content.gathalast: Akāle ovadaṃ bhikkhu, mandova paṭibhāti maṃ.
Dhammasmiṃ bhaññamānasmiṃ, atthaṃ bālo na bujjhati.
Neva dakkhati rūpāni, cakkhu hissa na vijjatī’’ti.
content.paragraph: Atha kho āyasmā kassapagotto tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.

Ekaṃ samayaṃ sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu viharanti aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṃvuṭṭhāvassaṃvutthāvassaṃvutthāvassaṃvutthāvassaṃvutthā temāsaccayena cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu. Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā te bhikkhū apassantī paridevamānā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
content.gathalast: Kome gotamasāvakā gatā’’ti.
content.paragraph: Evaṃ vutte, aññatarā devatā taṃ devataṃ gāthāya paccabhāsi –
content.gatha1: ‘‘Māgadhaṃ gatā kosalaṃ gatā, ekacciyā pana vajjibhūmiyā;
content.gathalast: Magā viya asaṅgacārino, aniketā viharanti bhikkhavo’’ti.
content.paragraph: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ānando ativelaṃ gihisaññattibahulo viharati. Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmato ānandassa anukampikā atthakāmā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ saṃvejetukāmā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
content.gathalast: Jhā gotama mā pamādomā ca pamādomā ca pamādo , kiṃ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī’’ti.
content.paragraph: Atha kho āyasmā ānando tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.

Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā anuruddho kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Atha kho aññatarā tāvatiṃsakāyikā devatā jālinī nāma āyasmato anuruddhassa purāṇadutiyikā yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tattha cittaṃ paṇidhehi, yattha te vusitaṃ pure;
content.gathalast: Purakkhato parivuto, devakaññāhi sobhasī’’ti.
Te cāpi duggatā sattā, devakaññāhi patthitā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na te sukhaṃ pajānanti, ye na passanti nandanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Āvāsaṃ naradevānaṃ, tidasānaṃ yasassina’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na tvaṃ bāle vijānāsi, yathā arahataṃ vaco;
content.gathalast: Uppajjitvā nirujjhanti, tesaṃ vūpasamo sukho.
Vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo’’ti.
content.paragraph: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā nāgadatto kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nāgadatto atikālena gāmaṃ pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati. Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmato nāgadattassa anukampikā atthakāmā āyasmantaṃ nāgadattaṃ saṃvejetukāmā yenāyasmā nāgadatto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ nāgadattaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi –
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kāle pavisa nāgadatta, divā ca āgantvā ativelacārī;
content.gathalast: Saṃsaṭṭho gahaṭṭhehi, samānasukhadukkho.
Mā heva maccurañño balavato, antakassa vasaṃ vasameyyātivasameyyātiupesī’’tivasamesī’’tivasamesī’’ti .
content.paragraph: Atha kho āyasmā nāgadatto tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.

Ekaṃ samayaṃ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu aññatarasmiṃ kule ativelaṃ ajjhogāḷhappatto viharati. Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejetukāmā yā tasmiṃ kule kulagharaṇī, tassā vaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
content.gathalast: Janā saṅgamma mantenti, mañca tañcatvañca kimantara’’nti.
Na tena maṅku hotabbaṃ, na hi tena kilissati.
Lahucittoti taṃ āhu, nāssa sampajjate vata’’nti.
content.paragraph: Ekaṃ samayaṃ aññataro vajjiputtako bhikkhu vesāliyaṃ viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Tena kho pana samayena vesāliyaṃ vajjiputtako sabbaratticāro hoti. Atha kho so bhikkhu vesāliyā tūriya-tāḷita-vādita-nigghosasaddaṃ sutvā paridevamāno tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
content.gathalast: Ko su nāmamhehināma amhehināma amhehi pāpiyo’’ti.
content.paragraph: Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ekakova tvaṃ araññe viharasi, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tassa te bahukā pihayanti, nerayikā viya saggagāmina’’nti.
content.paragraph: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.

Ekaṃ samayaṃ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu yaṃ sudaṃ pubbe ativelaṃ sajjhāyabahulo viharati so aparena samayena appossukko tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyati. Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno dhammaṃ asuṇantī yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kasmā tuvaṃ dhammapadāni bhikkhu, nādhīyasi bhikkhūhi saṃvasanto;
content.gathalast: Sutvāna dhammaṃ labhatippasādaṃ, diṭṭheva dhamme labhatippasaṃsa’’nti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ahu pure dhammapadesu chando, yāva virāgena samāgamimha;
content.gatha2: Yato virāgena samāgamimha, yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃva sutaṃ mutaṃ vā;
content.gathalast: Aññāya nikkhepanamāhu santo’’ti.
content.paragraph: Ekaṃ samayaṃ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divāvihāragato pāpake akusale vitakke vitakketi, seyyathidaṃ – kāmavitakkaṃ, byāpādavitakkaṃ, vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ. Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi –
content.gathalast: Ayonisoayoniṃayoniṃ paṭinissajja, yoniso anucintaya.
Tato pāmojjabahulo, dukkhassantaṃ karissasī’’ti.
content.paragraph: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.

Ekaṃ samayaṃ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Atha kho tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā tassa bhikkhuno santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
content.gathalast: Saṇateva brahāraññaṃ, taṃ bhayaṃ paṭibhāti maṃ.
Saṇateva brahāraññaṃ, sā rati paṭibhāti ma’’nti.
content.paragraph: Ekaṃ samayaṃ sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu viharanti aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā muṭṭhassatino asampajānā asamāhitā vibbhantacittā pākatindriyā. Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anukampikā atthakāmā te bhikkhū saṃvejetukāmā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi –
content.gathalast: Loke aniccataṃ ñatvā, dukkhassantaṃ akaṃsu te.
Bhutvā bhutvā nipajjanti, parāgāresu mucchitā.
Apaviddhāapaviṭṭhāapaviṭṭhā anāthā te, yathā petā tatheva te.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ye kho pamattā viharanti, te me sandhāya bhāsitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ye appamattā viharanti, namo tesaṃ karomaha’’nti.
content.paragraph: Atha kho te bhikkhū tāya devatāya saṃvejitā saṃvegamāpādunti.

Ekaṃ samayaṃ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe. Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto pokkharaṇiṃ ogāhetvā padumaṃ upasiṅghati. Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
content.gathalast: Ekaṅgametaṃ theyyānaṃ, gandhatthenosi mārisā’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ;
content.gathalast: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhatthenoti vuccati.
Evaṃ ākiṇṇakammanto, kasmā eso na vuccatī’’ti.
Tasmiṃ me vacanaṃ natthi, tvañcārahāmi vattave.
Vālaggamattaṃ pāpassa, abbhāmattaṃva khāyatī’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Addhā maṃ yakkha jānāsi, atho me anukampasi;
content.gathalast: Punapi yakkha vajjāsi, yadā passasi edisa’’nti.
Tvameva bhikkhu jāneyya, yena gaccheyya suggati’’nti.
content.paragraph: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.
Tassuddānaṃ –
content.gathalast: Ānando anuruddho ca, nāgadattañca kulagharaṇī.
Majjhanhikālamhi pākatindriya, padumapupphena cuddasa bhaveti.
